title: Angjello
author: Angjello
content: New Barbie NFT by Mattel criticized for granting entry to "Barbie Dreamworld", an unmoderated metaverse seemingly plagued by sexual predators.I saw this article written about the https://www.barbiedreamworld.com by a clueless fool, to be honest. I myself have minted and entered the dreamworld and encountered nothing but friendly people, and being web3 oriented its mostly just nerds, so i dont know who they think are being preyed upon!
